title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 20, 2022
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - January 20, 2022
description:
Mark and Gary link up and discuss a recent NPR article concerning the Supreme Court as well as a failed recall attempt of a Los Angeles City Council member.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
